price: Onun ağacını siz mi yarattınız? Yoksa yaratan biz miyiz?
arabic: ءَأَنتُمۡ أَنشَأۡتُمۡ شَجَرَتَهَآ أَمۡ نَحۡنُ ٱلۡمُنشِـُٔونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: a-antum anshatum shajaratahā am naḥnu al-munshiūna
